message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,300,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Alice,  $1,300,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to save a bit more, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $1,275,000. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.
